description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader versions 2019.010.20091 and earlier, 2019.010.20091 and earlier, 2017.011.30120 and earlier version, and 2015.006.30475 and earlier have a data leakage (sensitive) vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.
